inclusion.criterion: Confirmed diagnosis of symptomatic multiple myeloma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status score of 0, 1, or 2
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Peripheral neuropathy or neuropathic pain Grade 2 or higher
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with systemic amyloidosis, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various regimens and has relapsed disease.
